title: I made an open source ping testing tool for OCE + other regions.
body:
This is a simple batch script that will send a ping request to the following servers constantly and then display the response times in an easy to read format, this script will also send semi-realistic sized packets to get accurate response times (The packet size had to be lowered for OCE as the IP I am using to test seemingly drops any packet over a certain size)
**Supported Servers**

* OCE
* NA
* EUW1
* EUW2
* EUNE1
* EUNE2

For all wondering, this script doesn't test by directly pinging the servers IP addresses listed [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) as none of them (besides NA) respond directly to ICMP requests. This is merely testing to the closest address that responds during a traceroute to those addresses, thus the results may not be 100% accurate to your in-game results however it's as good as I can get. 

DL link: http://168.235.67.241/res/pingtest.bat

Unlike the tool posted by Rikka [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/E9KBE6Bn-i-made-a-ping-tester-for-oce-so-you-can-test-ping-pre-game) this is not closed source (as it's a batch file) thus you can analyze the file for yourself to look for malicious content, nor is this file located behind an adfly link thus I don't generate revenue for you simply loading the page to download the file.

replies.body: Thanks! I've always needed something like this :)

Wow, I get less ping on the EUNE2 server than I do NA. But what is the deal with NA being 269, I used to get 170 or less before OCE came out.

I also love how it is continuous, once it is connected it will show you a seemingly live ping.

I have a feeling EUNE2 isn't accurate as the traceroute seemingly stopped early, it's possible that the closest server that would respond is a hop somewhere in Asia.

NA recently had a server move to the other side of the country afaik, thus your ping would be higher than usual. I know I noticed at least a 50ms increase on NA the last time I played there.
